title: Crypto Trading 101 with AI Insights
description: An introductory course covering the fundamentals of cryptocurrencies and how AI can assist in basic trading strategies.
time_commitment: Approximately 4 weeks, assuming 3–5 hours per week.

title: "AI in Crypto: Getting Started" (Podcast Episode)
description: A friendly introduction to using AI for crypto trading, discussing market basics, risk management, and AI-driven tools.

title: YouTube: Build Your First AI Crypto Trading Bot
description: Step-by-step demonstration of creating a simple Python-based trading bot, integrating basic AI decision-making.

title: GitHub: Simple Crypto Trader (AI-Assisted)
description: A beginner-friendly repository illustrating a straightforward AI-assisted trading strategy using Python and an open-source ML library.

title: Udemy: Machine Learning for Algorithmic Crypto Trading
description: Learn how to apply machine learning models to algorithmic trading scenarios in various crypto markets.

title: "High-Frequency AI Crypto Trading" (Podcast Episode)
description: An in-depth look at applying AI to high-frequency trading strategies, including key challenges and techniques.

title: YouTube: AI for Real-Time Crypto Price Prediction
description: Explores integrating live market data feeds with AI models to generate short-term crypto price forecasts and trade signals.

title: GitHub: RL-Crypto-Trader
description: A repository demonstrating how reinforcement learning can be applied to automate crypto trading strategies.

title: Advanced Deep Learning for Crypto Markets (Course)
description: Covers sophisticated deep learning architectures (like LSTM and Transformers) for modeling complex crypto market behaviors.

title: "Quantitative AI Crypto Funds" (Podcast Episode)
description: Insights from hedge fund managers who utilize cutting-edge AI techniques for portfolio optimization and risk management.

title: YouTube: Building a Multi-Strategy AI Crypto Portfolio
description: Walkthrough of combining multiple AI-driven algorithms—momentum, arbitrage, and sentiment analysis—into a unified trading system.

title: GitHub: DeepCryptoTrader - Advanced Neural Nets
description: An advanced toolkit featuring deep neural networks, anomaly detection, and ensemble models for sophisticated trading.
time_commitment: 10–15 hours to fully explore and customize.

title: FreeCodeCamp: Intro to Blockchain & AI Development
description: A step-by-step introduction to building smart contracts and incorporating basic AI functionalities in decentralized apps.

title: "AI & Crypto Dev Starter" (Podcast Episode)
description: Covers fundamental tools and frameworks required to begin AI-augmented smart contract development on Ethereum.

title: YouTube: Building an AI-Enhanced DApp in 30 Minutes
description: Quick demonstration of creating a simple decentralized application that uses AI for basic on-chain analytics.

title: GitHub: Basic AI-Oriented Smart Contract Samples
description: Contains starter code for integrating AI-driven logic into Solidity smart contracts using oracles and external data feeds.

title: AI-Powered DApp Development (Online Course)
description: Teaches design patterns and frameworks for developing more advanced AI logic in decentralized applications, including testing and security considerations.

title: "Hybrid Smart Contracts & AI" (Podcast Episode)
description: Focuses on combining off-chain AI computations with on-chain logic, exploring the tech behind hybrid smart contracts.

title: YouTube: Tokenizing AI Models on Ethereum
description: Learn how to tokenize AI model ownership and usage rights, enabling decentralized governance and access control.

title: GitHub: AI-DApp-Boilerplate
description: A boilerplate project that seamlessly integrates AI inference calls with an Ethereum-based DApp, demonstrating best practices in code architecture.
time_commitment: 5–10 hours to customize and build upon.

title: Advanced AI & Zero-Knowledge Proof Development
description: Delves into privacy-preserving AI computations on blockchains, focusing on zero-knowledge proofs and advanced cryptographic techniques.

title: "Scaling AI-Driven Smart Contracts" (Podcast Episode)
description: Explores the complexities of deploying and scaling AI-intensive logic on various Layer 2 solutions and cross-chain protocols.

title: YouTube: Deep Dive into On-Chain AI Model Training
description: Explains experimental techniques for training AI models directly on-chain, including cost, performance, and security challenges.

title: GitHub: AI-Crypto-Framework (Advanced)
description: A comprehensive framework for creating next-gen decentralized AI applications, featuring built-in modules for zero-knowledge proofs, advanced data pipelines, and interoperable protocols.
